section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The Swedish Forest Industries Federation is the organisation for Swedish pulp, paper and woodworking industries. The Swedish Wood department and the secretariat for BioInnovation are parts of the Federation. 
 
The Swedish Forest Industries Federation represents some fifty pulp and paper manufacturers owned by some twenty groups of companies and about 120 wood mechanical companies owned by some 60 companies, as well as about 40 companies that have close ties with the production of pulp and paper or sawn timber manufacture.  
 
The Swedish forest based industry is the employer of close to 70 000 people and the value of the export was SEK 124 billion in 2014.
